title: Romance Guide
content:
cratch (dog) that he can come to your Camp if his friend doesn't wake up. Try to persuade the goblin guard outside the Goblin Camp. Agree to fight Fezzerk in the Blighted Village. Decline the Devil's invitation to remove your Tadpole. Agree to help Zevlor. Make Novice Crusher kiss your foot in the Goblin Camp. Help Karlach in Hunt the Devil quest.

All Wyll Approval Down Choices
